nodes.bodyText: nit: better rephrase comment as: //'' means no specific column
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,12 +30,14 @@ def help
   hbase> deleteall 't1', 'r1'
   hbase> deleteall 't1', 'r1', 'c1'
   hbase> deleteall 't1', 'r1', 'c1', ts1
+  hbase> deleteall 't1', 'r1', '', ts1        //'' means not specify column

nodes.bodyText: Maybe worth also explain that this command deletes all cells in the row which timestamp is lower than the one specified in the command.
